EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Roadshow_Benchmark Breakfast_Australia_Q318.1 Hour Reminder - Sydney
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Arrival Details - Sydney Breakfast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Please find below your arrival details for the Pivotal Executive Breakfast - Innovating at Startup Speed in a Software-Driven World.
Date: Tuesday, 23rd October 2018 Time: 8:30am - 10am (registration opens from 8am) Location: O Bar and Dining, Level 47 Australia Square, 264 George Street, Sydney 2000
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at communications-apj@pivotal.io.
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
